item.title: About Me
item.description:
$whoami

Hi!!

I am Rajat. A highschool student, with deep interest towards computerscience. I like promoting and contributing the use of free and open source software.

What skills have I acquired?

These are some of the skills I have acquired and learning:

  • C
  • Python
  • Linux
  • Bash
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript

Where do I plan to endup at?

I am looking forward to continue my journey in cybersecurity.

Where to find me?

Links to my socials are given below the site’s logo.

item.title: Support
item.description:
Want to support me?

Well, you can subscribe to my youtube channel and odysee channel also you can give me a follow on github. You can send me an email if you have any questions about the softwares I use on the software section.

You can find config files to most of these on my github page.

item.title: Links
item.description:
Here are some of the links to some people worth watching:

  • MentalOutlaw and his github here
  • Luke Smith
  • Eric Murphy

Resources to learn linux:

  • Arch Wiki

item.title: Softwares I Recommend
item.description:
For GNU/linux:

  • Neovim - text editor
  • LibreWolf - privacy respecting fork of mozilla’s firefox
  • KeepassXc - password manager {has browser integration}
  • mpd+ncmpcpp - mpd as music daemon & ncmpcpp an mpd client
  • dwm+slstatus - dwm as my window manager & slstatus as status bar

For android:

These are available in github

  • Iceraven browser - fork of mozilla firefox with support for lots of addons
  • Seal - music and video downloader(gui) which uses yt-dlp
  • Blackhole - easy music downloader
  • NeoBackups - for backups

You can find configs to some of these software on my github
